//Data Structure includes
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>


//Other Includes
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cassert>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
//#include<bitset>

using namespace std;


#define FOR(i,a,b)							for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define REP(i,n)							FOR(i,0,n)
#define pb								push_back
#define fill(a,v) 							memset(a, v, sizeof a)
#define SZ								size()
#define INF								(int)1e9
#define EPS								1e-9
#define bitcount							__builtin_popcount
#define all(x)								x.begin(), x.end()


typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<vector<int> > VVI;
typedef long long LL;
typedef pair<int, int > PII;

#define E(x) cout<<#x<<" "<<x<<endl;

/*Main code begins now */

int n;

void input()
{
    scanf("%d",&n);
}

void solve()
{
    int ans=sqrt(n);
    int realAns=ans;
    if ((ans+1)*(ans+1)<=n) realAns=ans+1;
    if (ans*ans>n) realAns=ans-1;

    printf("%d\n",realAns);
}

void precompute()
{

}

int main()
{
    precompute();

    int T;
    scanf("%d",&T);

    while (T--)
    {
        input();
        solve();
    }
    return 0;
}
